name: Medium (medium.com ) – Dark Grey (Discontinued)
description:
*Dear users! Stylish became way less popular thing since controversy with user data. There's new better way to have dark mode everywhere across the web called 'Dark Reader' extension. It does pretty same job as I did manually. So my styles are no more supported.*

Dark grey background, optimal contrast for reading.

Continuosly updated

Guys, you can always ask to add urls...

Also applies for: uxdesign.cc, prototypr.io, blog.framer.com, uxplanet.org, medium.freecodecamp.org, medium.muz.li, hackernoon.com, writingcooperative.com, 500ish.com.

2018.07.21 - profile and article pages update

2018.2.1 - freecodecamp link fixed
2017.12.10 - a little bit of fixes. Also there is a regex to catch 12-digit hex code of each article (hopefully this will work on some medium blogs not present in my list of URLs)
2017.11.17 - the style is merged to a single section, now it's easier to add new sites support via plugin editor. Also small fixes.

2017.09.17 - removed regex;
2017.08.28 - top hightlight style fixed;
2017.08.23 - site redesign update;
2017.08.18 - re- f*- design! (mainly fixed issues with accent colors)
2017.08.11 - small updates
2017.07.22 - subscribe stuff fixed to be dark too.
2017.07.14 - added path alias: now style is applied to any site having 'medium' in address
